body:
It's 2019, time to update all the copyright statements.

This, of course, also brings a large number of files to flake8's attention, and finds bugs that weren't detected in prior scans.  This year the big one seems to be [W605](https://lintlyci.github.io/Flake8Rules/rules/W605.html).  It's probably a good one to catch; there were a lot of regular strings in Spack that really should've been raw.  Now they are.
title: Copyright 2019
